metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12641 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
rcube_image.php in Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4 allows attackers toexecute arbitrary code via shell metacharacters in a configuration settingfor im_convert_path or im_identify_path.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12641` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.4+dfsg.1-1').
